typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMP_ID as decimal(15,0),
		EMP_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'select * from ARN_LANDING.EMPLOYEE',
	format: 'query') ~> Upsertlogic
source(output(
		SURRKEY as decimal(38,0),
		EMP_ID as decimal(15,0),
		EMP_NAME as string,
		IS_ACTIVE as decimal(10,0),
		LAST_MODIFIED_DATE as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'select * from arn_curated.employee',
	format: 'query') ~> employeeTable
Upsertlogic derive(isActive = 1,
		lastmodifieddate = currentUTC()) ~> addingisActive
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(Curated_EMP_ID)) ~> ExistingRows
ExistingRows select(mapColumn(
		Curated_SURRKEY,
		Curated_EMP_ID,
		Curated_EMP_NAME,
		Curated_IS_ACTIVE,
		Curated_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(Curated_IS_ACTIVE = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
employeeTable select(mapColumn(
		Curated_SURRKEY = SURRKEY,
		Curated_EMP_ID = EMP_ID,
		Curated_EMP_NAME = EMP_NAME,
		Curated_IS_ACTIVE = IS_ACTIVE,
		Curated_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renametargetcolumn
Upsertlogic, renametargetcolumn lookup(EMP_ID == Curated_EMP_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SURRKEY as decimal(38,0),
		EMP_ID as decimal(15,0),
		EMP_NAME as string,
		IS_ACTIVE as decimal(10,0),
		LAST_MODIFIED_DATE as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SURRKEY'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		SURRKEY = Curated_SURRKEY,
		EMP_ID = Curated_EMP_ID,
		EMP_NAME = Curated_EMP_NAME,
		IS_ACTIVE = Curated_IS_ACTIVE,
		LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = Curated_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
	)) ~> sink2
addingisActive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SURRKEY as decimal(38,0),
		EMP_ID as decimal(15,0),
		EMP_NAME as string,
		IS_ACTIVE as decimal(10,0),
		LAST_MODIFIED_DATE as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	stageInsert: true,
	mapColumn(
		EMP_ID,
		EMP_NAME,
		IS_ACTIVE = isActive,
		LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = lastmodifieddate
	)) ~> sink1
